query:
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN categoryId INT,
ADD COLUMN businessAreaId INT,
ADD COLUMN icon VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'FileText',
ADD COLUMN color VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN variableSchema JSON,
ADD COLUMN estimatedTimeSavings INT,
ADD COLUMN creditCost INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN llmModel VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN llmTemperature DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.70,
ADD COLUMN maxTokens INT,
ADD COLUMN outputFormat ENUM('markdown', 'json', 'text', 'html') DEFAULT 'markdown',
ADD COLUMN exampleOutput TEXT,
ADD COLUMN documentRequired INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN documentCount INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN allowedFileTypes JSON,
ADD COLUMN maxFileSize INT DEFAULT 10485760,
ADD COLUMN maxPages INT,
ADD COLUMN documentRelevanceCheck INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN documentDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN maskingRequired INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN maskingTypes JSON,
ADD COLUMN autoMasking INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN keywords JSON,
ADD COLUMN marketingEnabled INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN marketingHeadline VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN marketingSubheadline VARCHAR(200),
ADD COLUMN marketingUsps JSON,
ADD COLUMN marketingCtaText VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN marketingMetaDescription VARCHAR(160),
ADD COLUMN marketingKeywords JSON,
ADD COLUMN createdByName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN lastModifiedByName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN templateVersion VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '1.0',
ADD COLUMN changeLog TEXT;
